## Options interface

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Options
```

## Properties

| Property                                             | Type                                                                                                      | Description                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------- |
